description: Programme of Support for Deepening Democracy in Indonesia

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: The project envisions the furthering of the parliamentary reform in DPR so that it could become a more accountable democratic political institution while performing its functions and tasks. This vision is linked to the larger context of the parliamentary reform that covers MPR, DPR and DPD.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Parliamentary reform

subproject.description: The support to DPD is envisioned to create a well functioning DPD as a democratic institution for a more effective checks and balances system as well as to promote democratic decentralized governance.
